options.name: private
options.description: Only show the reply to you. (False)

name: announce
description: Send an announcement in the current channel.

options.name: message
options.description: The message to send. Use "\n" for newlines.

name: timed-announce
description: Send a timed announcement in the current channel.

options.name: message
options.description: The message to send. Use "\n" for newlines.

options.name: wait
options.description: Enter how many minutes to wait + rounding to the next hour.

name: rules
description: Send formatted rules in the current channel.

options.name: title
options.description: The title of the rules embed.

options.name: rules
options.description: The rules. Use "\n" for separating rules.

options.name: info
options.description: A small disclaimer right after the rules. Use "\n" for newlines.

name: roleselector
description: Create a roleselector in the current channel.

options.name: roles
options.description: The roles to be able to select. Use "\n" for separating roles.

options.name: multiselect
options.description: Allow multiple roles to be selected. (False)
